option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Match the class used in SvgaTestActivity imports --> <com.opensource.svgaplayer.SVGAImageView android:id="@+id/svgaImageView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:scaleType="centerInside" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btnPlay" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/svga_play_button" /> </LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Match the class used in SvgaTestActivity imports --> <com.opensource.svgaplayer.SVGAImageView android:id="@+id/svgaImageView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:scaleType="centerInside" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btnPlay" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/svga_play_button" /> </LinearLayout>
